pr_title: TRUNK-5864 UUID functions support for PostgreSQL

timeline.message: TRUNK-5864 UUID functions support for PostgreSQL

timeline.bodyText: Do we need the double quotes?
timeline.author: dkayiwa
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -86,6 +86,11 @@
         <sql> CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS fuzzystrmatch SCHEMA public;</sql>
     </changeSet>
     
+    <changeSet id="20200715-uuid_ossp_extension" author="aman" dbms="postgresql">
+        <comment> Extension to use UUID functions with PostgreSQL</comment>
+        <sql> CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS "uuid-ossp" SCHEMA public;</sql>

replies.bodyText: @dkayiwa , Yes, else you will get an error due to "-" in uuid-ossp .
replies.author: Am-Coder
